word: When Satan would lead the mind to dwell upon earthly and sensual things, he is most effectually resisted with "It is written." . . . When he suggests doubts as to whether we are really the people whom God is leading, whom by tests and provings He is preparing to stand in the great day, be ready to meet his insinuations by presenting the clear evidence from the Word of God that this is the remnant people who are keeping the commandments of God and the faith of Jesus.--RH, Apr 8, 1884.
